channel.title: grantler records rss feed
channel.description: a home for direct, imperfect and honest music.

item.title: 50 Jahre Kraftwerk Autobahn
item.description:
Es sind die Siebziger-Jahre. In der Bundesrepublik herrscht über weite Strecken noch die Biederkeit eines Nachkriegsdeutschlands. Viele Familien wohnen in schmucklosen Mietskasernen, mit grobem Teppich, Schrankwand und schweren Sitzmobilar. Die deutschsprachigen Hitparaden werden von gefühligem Schlager dominiert: Chris Roberts stellt fest „Du kannst nicht immer 17 sein“. Und Vicky Leandros fährt mit Theo nach Lodz.
Doch ein kleiner Kreis von Vordenkern arbeitet international an der Zukunft. ...
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Beirut - Hadsel
item.description: Zach Condon released a new album, recorded in Hadsel in north Norway. pump organs, church organs, ukulele and modular synths <3. a very touching interview can be found here.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Spencer Zahn - Statues II
item.description: Brooklyn-based Spencer Zahn released Statues II, the companion piece of a double album which stared with Statues I in August this year.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.description: Austin Farwell, the most streamed pianist in the United States, has released a new album featuring eight piano tracks.

item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Damon Albarn - The Nearer The Fountain, More Pure The Stream Flows
item.description: Damon Albarn released his second solo album. it was intended as an orchestral piece, plans changed as the covid 19 pandemic made him cancel his tour. he said in a statement: I have been on my own dark journey while making this record and it led me to believe that a pure source might still exist.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Sophie Hutchings - Echoes In The Valley
item.description: Sydney based Sophie Hutchings released a new solo piano album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: The War On Drugs - I Don't Live Here Anymore
item.description: The War On Drugs released their fifth album. they still sound like the War On Drugs. in a good way.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.description: Meg Duffy released their new Hand Habis album, it features guest vocals by Perfume Genius.

item.title: Grouper - Shade
item.description: Grouper (Liz Harris) released the 12th album, it is a collection of new songs that were made over the past 15 years.

item.description: still not dead. and, still not sounding the same after 27 years. Low released their 13th album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Sir Simon - Repeat Until Funny, Burkini Beach - Best Western
item.description: Simon Frontzek is back with a new lp after ten years. Rudi Maier (Burkini Beach) released a new lp as well. they co-produced each other and even wrote a song together (Not Coming Home) which can be found on both albums.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Angus & Julia Stone - Life Is Strange
item.description: Angus & Julia Stone released a new album after almost four years. it is the soundtrack to the upcoming video game, Life Is Strange: True Colors. here is the acoustic version of the opening track.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Devendra Banhart, Noah Georgeson - Refuge
item.description: Devendra Banhart and Noah Georgeson have teamed up on a new ambient album. Noah Georgeson who has procuded albums of Devendra Banhart in the past, now composed and recorded 12 tracks with him.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.description: Ryan Karazija released his fifth lp entitled Maybe Tomorrow. it contains 12 tracks.

item.description: dreampop from New Zealand.

item.description: Brooklyn-based A Place to Bury Strangers released a new ep, consisting of five shoegaze tracks.

item.description: Midpoint Union is Portugal-based Pedro R. he recorded his new album in his home studio.

item.description: new heaven metal from Colorado! recorded with amongst others with the three members of DIIV.

item.title: Daniel Avery - Together In Static
item.description: Daniel Avery released a new lp, it is comprised of music created for his live show at London’s Hackney Church on May 29.

item.title: Max Cooper - Maps
item.description: Max Cooper's released a new four-track ep. he collaborated with classical Indian vocalist Samad Khan. the opening track Weakness Of The Flesh scores a dance choreography by Jacob Jonas dance company and dancer Emma Rosenzweig-Bock. it is part of the films.dance project.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Slut - Talks of Paradise
item.description: Slut, finally, after 8 years of silence.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Andy Bell - All on You
item.description: Andy Bell (Ride, Oasis) released a four track ep, featuring acoustic versions originally recorded for radio sessions.

item.description: Maxi Pongratz, Micha Acher, Theresa Loibl, Maria Hafner, Cico Beck, Agnes Liberta, Timm Kornelius, Matthias Meichelböck and Alois Schmelz
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.description: Japanese vibraphonist, multi-percussionist and composer Masayoshi Fujita released his new lp Bird Ambience.

item.description: Tape Waves are Kim and Jarod Weldin, they are based in South Carolina and just released their third lp.

item.title: Slowly - Reverse
item.description: Toronto-based diy person Charly Berger released the forgotten "left over" tracks from his album Reveal. they made it onto his new ep Reverse.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Marissa Nadler - Instead of Dreaming
item.description: Marissa Nadler's new album includes eight covers, wrapped in two original songs. she covers Bob Dylan, Bee Gees and Metallica, among others.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: happy birthday, Bob!
item.description: I was so much older then I'm younger than that now.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Indigo Sparke - Echo
item.description: Australian musician Indigo Sparke released her debug lp, it was co-produced by Adrianne Lenker (Big Thief).
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Lea Porcelain - Choirs to Heaven
item.description: Berlin based synth pop/post punk duo Lea Porcelain released the second album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Aloa Input - Devil's Diamond Memory Collection
item.description: Munich-based supergroup Aloa Input (Cico Beck, Florian Kreier, Marcus Grassl) released their third lp. we are looking forward to seeing them performing live soon. hopefully.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: You, Nothing - Lonely // Lovely
item.description: shoegaze/dreampop from Italy!
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Will Stratton - The Changing Wilderness
item.description: Will Stratton released his seventh studio album, mixed and engineered by himself. it contains 10 tracks.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Flatsound - on a tv that no one saw
item.description: songwriter Mitch Welling released a new six track ep.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Ja, Panik - Die Gruppe
item.description: we are lucky that Andreas Spechtl, the most sophisticated DEnglish singer since Falco after some also very promising solo projects finally decided to release another album with his group Ja, Panik again. the dystopian songs maybe even fit a bit too well to the current situation. although they were all written before it. they are also accompanied by a modular synthesizer and a saxophone now. and they even manage to let that sound neither jazzy nor cheesy 80s careless whisperish. with that they proof that there is still some beauty left in this world. even if it’s only within.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Fabrizio Paterlini - LifeBlood
item.description: Fabrizio Paterlini released the second part of his album LifeBlood. the first part Life was already released earlier this year, it contains solo piano arrangments. the second part is more of a cinematic nature..
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: MØAA - Euphoric Recall
item.description: Euphoric Recall is MØAA’s debut lp. Jancy Rae began writing and recording demos in seattle, she then moved to Venice and finished recording in collaboration with Andrea Volpato.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Small Black - Cheap Dreams
item.description: Brooklyn-based Small Black released a new lp titled Cheap Dreams. it is their first record in five years.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Sufjan Stevens - Meditations
item.description: Sufjan Stevens release the first volumne of his Convocations series. it is called Meditations. Lamentations, Revelations, Celebrations, and Incantations — will be released in April and May. Convocations is a tribute to his biological father, who died in September 2020.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Bell Orchestre - House Music
item.description: Canadian instrumentalists Bell Orchestre released a new lp in over a decade. House Music is a largely improvised album, recorded in one session.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Nils Frahm - Graz
item.description: 88 days, 88 keys, and a new Nils Frahm album released on Piano Day 2021.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: The Antlers - Green to Gold
item.description: The Antlers are back with their first album in seven years.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Xiu Xiu - OH NO
item.description: duets! the new Xiu Xiu album features collaborations with Sharon Van Etten, Chelsea Wolfe, Owen Pallett, Drab Majesty and many more.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Scyr - So Sad
item.description: lost in 80s. new wave from munich.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Max Black - The Outside
item.description: Philadelphia based shoegaze!
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Homespun Retrospect
item.description: our dear deer Lens Arc contributed to a Deerhunter cover compiliaton. his interpretation of Cryptograms is one of ten very unique Deerhunter homages.

item.title: Alice Gift - Alles ist Gift
item.description: Alice Gift (Velvet Condom, Liste Noire) released the debug album Alles ist Gift.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: A Winged Victory for the Sullen - Invisible Cities
item.description: neoclassical-ambient duo of Adam Wiltzie and Dustin O’Halloran released their fourth album, the score to a theatre production directed by London Olympics ceremony video designer Leo Warner.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Fabrizio Paterlini - Life
item.description: Fabrizio Paterlini released the first part of his project LifeBlood. Life contains six intimate and fragile piano tracks. the second part will be out in april.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Animal Collective - Crestone (Original Score)
item.description: Animal Collective scored a documentary about a group of SoundCloud rappers. animal collective scoring a film about rappers sounds like a contradiction, but works very well. Crestone a film by Marnie Ellen Hertzler.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Mogwai - As The Love Continues
item.description: 10th studio album. produced by Dave Fridmann
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: SUB ROSA - Sub Rosa EP
item.description: California based Band SUB ROSA released a new ep. beautiful dreamy shoegaze, hardly any information on the internet.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Still Corners - The Last Exit
item.description: The Last Exit is the fifth studio album from London based Still Corners.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Medio Mutante - Drum Machines and Synthesizers
item.description: lofi beats and synth by Medio Mutante.

item.title: Anna B Savage - A Common Turn
item.description: London based singer songwriter and musician Anna B Savage released her debut lp. it is quite intimate.

item.title: The Notwist - Vertigo Days
item.description: Finally!
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Motorama - Before The Road
item.description: Russian post punk band Motorama released their 6th studio album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Widowspeak - Honeychurch
item.description: after releasing Plum in August last year, Widowspeak is back with a new ep. it features two covers, R.E.M.'s The One I Love and Romeo and Juliet by Dire Straits.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Grandbrothers - All the Unknown
item.description: Erol Sarp and Lukas Vogel are back with their third lp. as on previous albums, All the Unknown fuses piano sounds and electronics in a beautiful and elegant way. their making of video impressively shows the gear they use to create these warm sounds.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Casper Clausen - Better Way
item.description: Better Way is Casper Clausen's (Efterklang) debut solo lp, it was recorded by Peter Kember of Sonic Boom and Spaceman 3.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Dreams of Empire - Encapsulation
item.description: Jane and Andrew Craig are a Brighton based shoegaze/dreampop couple. they released their second lp.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Seasurfer - Zombies
item.description: Hamburg based shoegaze band seasurfer released their third album - Zombies.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Medio Mutante - 800%
item.description: 800% is a slow motion remix album of 13 Medio Mutante tracks from the last 13 years. It's over three hours long, it was remixed utilizing digital and analog tools such as microcassette recorders, paulstretch, mammut, max/msp and reel-to-reel tape machines.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Max Richter - Beethoven - Opus 2020
item.description: happy birthday Beethoven!
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Nicholas Lens, Nick Cave – L.I.T.A.N.I.E.S
item.description: Nick Cave has written the libretto for L.I.T.A.N.I.E.S, Nicholas Lens' new opera.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Sigur Rós – Odin’s Raven Magic
item.description:
finally!
Odin’s Raven Magic is a collaboration between Sigur Rós, Hilmar Örn Hilmarsson, Steindór Andersen and Maria Huld Markan Sigfúsdóttir (Amiina). it was originally premiered during 2002 at London's Barbican centre.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Girls in Airports - Dive
item.description: Girls in Airports released their sixth studio album. they create beautiful soundscapes by combining jazz, indie and urban folk.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Chilly Gonzales - ENYA: A Treatise on Unguilty Pleasures
item.description: Chilly Gonzales released a book about Enya, taste, authenticity. it is available as an audio book as well.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Martin Kohlstedt - FLUR
item.description: Klassik darf alles sein, bloß nicht elitär.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Ane Brun - How Beauty Holds The Hand Of Sorrow
item.description: Norwegian musician Ane Brun released her eighth album. it is quite different to its predecessor After The Great Strom, which was released last month.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: I Am Oak - Odd Seeds (Pt 1)
item.description: Ultrecht based I Am Oak released a new lp. it contains 14 tracks.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Clara Luzia - 4 + 1
item.description: Clara Luzia's new ep contains four originals and one cover song.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Silent Sex - Ohnmacht
item.description: based in minga. and very much into c major and reverb. the new silent sex single is available on most major streaming services. don't hesitate to message us for stems, if you want to sample, remix or be otherwise creative with it.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Молчат Дома - Дискотека
item.description: Molchat Doma are a cold wave band from Belarus. they just released their third studio album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick - Ways of Hearing
item.description: taking their name from a Peter Handke's novel, adapted into Wim Wenders's first feature, The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick is a new Philadelphia based band. their debut Ways of Hearing reminds of early Bright Eyes records.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Kraków Loves Adana - A Night to Remember
item.description: Kraków Loves Adana are eleasing a new ep, it is a spin-off feature of Darker Darkness, released only a couple of weeks ago. limited vsh style blood red tapes are available on their bandcamp page.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Ólafur Arnalds - some kind of peace
item.description: Icelandic composer and multi instrumentalist Ólafur Arnalds' new album is out now. it features guest appearances from Bonobo, JFDR and Josin.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Eels - Earth to Dora
item.description: Earth to Dora is Eel's thirteenth studio album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Stella Sommer - Northern Dancer
item.description: Stella Sommer (Die Heiterkeit) is providing us a new quarantine soundtrack. the ten tracks on her new album are reduced to the minimal - namely her voice and piano.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Lebanon Hanover - Sci-Fi Sky
item.description: dark wave duo Lebanon Hanover released their new 10 track lp titled Sci-Fi Sky.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Tomberlin - Projections
item.description: Sarah Beth's soft voice flys away on a cloud of instruments on her new EP 'Projections'.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Matt Berninger - Serpentine Prison
item.description: Serpentine Prison is Matt Berninger's (The National) warm, analog, emotional solo debut album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Kevin Morby - Sundowner
item.description: Sundowner is Kevin Morby's sixth solo album. it contains ten honest lofi tracks.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Future Islands - As Long As You Are
item.description: synth pop band Future Island released their sixth lp..
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Penguin Cafe - Handfuls of Night (Explored)
item.description: Penguin Cafe released a special version of the 2009 piece Handfuls of Night. it includes a track-by-track audio commentary, plus a bonus track. a short making of video can be found here.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Atli Örvarsson, Sin Fang - Flóra
item.description: Iceland. emotions.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: BlankFor.ms - Memory
item.description: BlankFor.ms released a new four track ep, with tape loops, analog synths, glitches and warm textures. for the music production nerds: he explains some production techniques and does gear reviews on his youtube channel.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Anna von Hausswolff - All Thoughts Fly
item.description: Anna von Hausswolff released a new instrumental album, using only one instrument - namely the pipe organ.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Kraków Loves Adana - Darker Darkness
item.description: the duo Kraków Loves Adana are back with a new album, somewhere between dream pop and dark wave.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Fenne Lily - BREACH
item.description: Bristol based Fenne Lily released her second album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Cut Copy - Freeze, Melt
item.description: Melbourne based synth pop band Cut Copy released their sixth studio album - called Freeze, Melt.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Kevin Morby - Campfire
item.description: first single from Kevin Morby's new album Sundowner, to be released October 16, 2020.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Jeremy Gara - Passerine Finale
item.description: Jeremy Gara (Arcade Fire) released his second solo album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Буерак - Компактные откровения
item.description: Буерак is a post-punk, new Russian wave band from Novosibirsk. they released their fifth studio album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Linea Aspera - Linea Aspera LP II
item.description: London based cold wave duo Linea Aspera (Alison Lewis und Ryan Ambridge) is back with a new lp.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Shlohmo - Heaven Inc
item.description: LA based Shlohmo released a new four track ep, full of noises and glitches.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Lens Arc - Monolith / Receptor
item.description: Monolith / Receptor by our dear Lens Arc is now available on most streaming services. it was first released in 2016. please feel free to message us if you are interested in tapes.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Widowspeak - Plum
item.description: Brooklyn-based dreampop duo Widowspeak just released their fifth album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Angel Olsen - Whole New Mess
item.description: Angel Olsen released a raw and more intimate version of her All Mirrors lp.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: For Belarus - For Belarus
item.description: a new compilation, For Belarus, has been released to support the victims of repression and police violence in Belarus. the funds are being sent directly to the Belarus Solidarity Foundation – one of several charitable organisations currently helping the country. it includes tracks by Molly Nilsson, Thomas Azier, Molchat Doma and many more.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Bright Eyes - Down in the Weeds, Where the World Once Was
item.description: Bright Eyes return with their first new album in nine years.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Library Tapes - The Quiet City
item.description: David Wenngren released a new Library Tapes album, it was made in collaboration with many other artists. it contains 10 instrumental tracks.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: The Notwist - Ship
item.description: The Notwist released a new ep.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Meena - EP
item.description: Manchester based shoegaze duo Meena released their debut ep.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Black Marble - I Must Be Living Twice
item.description: Brooklyn based Chris Stewart release a cover ep, including songs by Wire, Robert Palmer, Grouper and more.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Sin Fang - The Last Shall Be First
item.description: Reykjavík based Sindri Már Sigfússon (Seabear) released a new album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Land of Talk - Indistinct Conversations
item.description: Land of Talk, the band around lead singer Elizabeth Powell released their fourth album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Alison Mosshart - Sound Wheel
item.description: Alison Mosshart (The Kills) released her first solo spoken word album, it contains 47 short tracks and it is a companion album to her new book Car Ma.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Max Richter - Voices
item.description: British composer Max Richter released a new album. it features the Universal Declaration of Human Rights, spoken by various people in different languages. he also released an app version of his 2005 piece sleep.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Ruby Haunt - Tiebreaker
item.description: LA based Ruby Haunt released a very intimate new album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: The Notwist - Ship
item.description: The new The Notwist single is taken from their upcoming ep Ship, out august 21, 2020. it features Saya (Tenniscoats, Spirit Fest) and serves as an outlook to a new upcoming lp.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Rival Consoles - Articulation
item.description: English musician Ryan Lee West released his new album Articulation, full with glitches and warm analog synths.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Lens Arc
item.description: we re-released Paper Walls by our dear Lens Arc. please feel free to message us if you are interested in tapes.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: JARV IS... - Beyond the Pale
item.description: JARV IS… is Jarvis Cocker's new band project. against the original plan of only performing live and not releasing albums, they have taken live recordings and overdubbed them in the studio. They call it an "alive album", rather than a live one [src].
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Nicolas Jaar - Telas
item.description: Nicolas Jaar released his third album. Telas contains four ambient tracks, each around 15 minutes.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Yo La Tengo - We Have Amnesia Sometimes
item.description: I don't care if Monday's blue. Tuesday's grey and Wednesday too. Thursday, I don't care about you. It's Friday, I'm in love with Yo La Tengo
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Zoon - Bleached Wavves
item.description:
Shoegaze anyone?
Zoon's debut was released last month and it is full of beautiful guitar textures, reverbs and glitches.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Animal Collective - Bridge to Quiet
item.description: Animal Collective surprisingly released a new ep. Bridge to Quiet contains four tracks, each of them is over seven minutes long.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: bdrmm - Bedroom
item.description: Hull/Leeds based bdrmm released their much anticipated debut Bedroom. it was recorded in Leeds and mastered in Brooklyn by Heba Kadry (Slowdive, Beach House).
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: The Vacant Lots - Interzone
item.description: NY based psych shoegaze duo released their third album, it is called Interzone.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Phoebe Bridgers - Punisher
item.description: singer and songwriter Phoebe Bridgers's (Boygenius, Better Oblivion Community Center) second album has been released.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Rolling Blackouts Coastal Fever - Sideways to New Italy
item.description:
guitars <3
the Australian quintet Rolling Blackouts Coastal Fever released their second album. the high expectations after their debut Hope Down have been met.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Low Roar - Inure
item.description: Ryan Karazija is American, lives in Reykjavík and just released a warm and calm new ep.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: GoGo Penguin - GoGo Penguin
item.description: Manchester experimental jazz group GoGo Penguin released their self-titled forth album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Jehnny Beth - To Love Is To Live
item.description: Jehnny Beth (frontwoman of Savages and half of the lo-fi duo John & Jehn) dropped her solo debut album. it is moving between cinematic and industrial sounds, between power and vulnerability. she and Johnny Hostile also released a collection of erotic short stories, Crimes Against Love Manifesto (C.A.L.M.).
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Lebanon Hanover - The Last Thing
item.description: Lebanon Hanover are teasing us with a little two track ep, a full lp will follow later this year.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: XTR Human - Interior
item.description: XTR Human are back with a new post punk/shoegaze/dreampop album.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Tame Impala "Borderline" - oder: das Kunstwerk im Zeitalter seiner ständigen Veränderbarkeit
item.description: Tame lmpala, die gelungene Neohippie-One-Man-Show-Band des Australiers Kevin Parker, hat Anfang des Jahres ihr lang erwartetes viertes Studioalbum „The Slow Rush“ veröffentlicht. Es strahlt ein gleichermaßen melancholisches wie sonnendurchflutetes 70er Jahre Flair aus und ist von Yacht-Rock und elektrischen Supertramp-Pianos inspiriert. Es klingt nach einem besseren und stilvolleren L.A. vergangener Tage, das es so vermutlich nie gegeben hat ...
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Sonic Boom - All Things Being Equal
item.description: Pete Kember's new album sounds like a mix of Kraftwerk and Animal Collective. it is the first Sonic Boom album after Spectrum, which was released in 1989. in the meantime, the former Spacemen 3 member produced and collaborated with bands like MGMT, Beach House or Panda Bear and released music as Spectrum or E.A.R. (Experimental Audio Research).
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Owen Pallett - Island
item.description: Owen Pallett surprises with Island, his first studio album in 6 years. Island was recorded live at Abbey Road Studios with the London Contemporary Orchestra.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Nation of Language - Introduction, Presence
item.description: Brooklyn based new wave trio Nation of Language self-released their debut Introduction, Presence.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Christian Lee Hutson - Beginners
item.description: LA based singer songwriter Christian Lee Hutson released his new album Beginners. it contains ten honest and intimate tracks. it was produced by Phoebe Bridgers (Boygenius and Better Oblivion Community Center).
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Deerhoof - Future Teenage Cave Artists
item.description: Deerhoof released their 16th studio album. it is as usual unusual.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Cigarettes After Sex - You're All I Want
item.description: Cigarettes After Sex have surprise-dropped a new single You're All I Want. it was recorded during the sessions for their album cry and is hopefully part of a new album coming soon.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Woods - Strange To Explain
item.description: The Brooklyn based folk rock band Woods released their 11th studio album. It is less lo-fi than the previews ones.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Spirit Fest - Mirage Mirage
item.description: Spirit Fest are Saya and Takashi Ueno (Tenniscoats), Markus Acher (The Notwist, Rayon), Cico Beck (Aloa Input, The Notwist) and Mat Fowler (Jam Money, Bons). their third album Mirage Mirage contains 14 beautiful tracks.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Perfume Genius - Set My Heart On Fire Immediately
item.description: Set My Heart on Fire Immediately is the fifths album of Mike Hadreas. its 13 tracks are quite diverse, lyrics are honest and poetic.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: I Break Horses - Warnings
item.description: I Break Horses released after 6 years, a crashed hard drive and failed collaborations a new album. Fredrik Balck joined songwriter Maria Lindén on drums.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Midwife - Forever
item.description: already a month old, but still worth sharing. Denver musician Madeline Johnston released her second album, she calls her music heaven metal.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Mark Lanegan - Straight Songs Of Sorrow
item.description: The former Screaming Trees frontman. Queens of the Stone Age collaborator and friend of Kurt Cobain released his 12th solo album, Straight Songs Of Sorrow. his book Sing Backwards and Weep was released last week. he has clearly seen and experienced some shit in his life.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Field Works - Ultrasonic
item.description: Stuart Hyatt, echolocations of bats, nature and many contributors.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Ride, Pêtr Aleksänder - Clouds In The Mirror
item.description: London-based duo Pêtr Aleksänder (Tom Hobden, Noah & The Whale and Eliot James, Two Door Cinema Club) transformed Ride's album This Is Not A Safe Place into a new athmospheric piece.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Shards & Isolation Choir - Inside I'll Sing
item.description: London-based experimental vocal ensemble Shards teamed up with a couple of musicians and released Inside I'll Sing. their Isolation Choir consists of Douglas Dare, Joe Newman (Alt-J), Jonathan Donahue (Mercury Rev), Anna Meredith, New York-based composer Nico Muhly, Luke Howard, Hatis Noit and many more. proceeds will be donated.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Other Lives - For Their Love
item.description: having experimented with electronic textues on their last album (Rituals, 2015), Other Lives went back to an analog setup for the new album. it was recorded in songwriter Jesse Tabish' new house somewhere in the rural Cooper Mountain region of Oregon.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Die Wilde Jagd - Haut
item.description: 4 songs, 45 minutes.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Slut - For The Soul There Is No Hospital
item.description: after seven silent years, Slut just released their new single For The Soul There Is No Hospital.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Chromatics - Teacher
item.description: Chromatics have released their new song Teacher and the tracklist for their upcoming album Dear Tommy. a few weeks ago they already released Faded Now, a suprise album which includes a few remixes of songs from Closer To Grey and a couple of new ones.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Soap&Skin - What's up?
item.description: And another very beautiful cover by Anja Plaschg, aka Soap&Skin. she and her sister Evelyn just published a new interpretation of the 90s classic What's up by the 4 Non Blondes. and I pray, oh my god do I pray, I pray every single day, for a revolution.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Porridge Radio - Every Bad
item.description: "grantig", repetitive and from Brighton.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: M. Ward - Migration Stories
item.description: Migration Stories is M. Ward's (She & Him, Monsters of Folk) tenth studio release and was recorded at Arcarde Fire's Montreal studio.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Social Isolation
item.description: Created and compiled during the last week of March 2020, this compilation brings together the sound of artists in isolation creating music that's reflective of our collective struggle during the Covid-19 pandemic. Those featured in this edition are of Indian origin [src].
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Daniel Avery, Alessandro Cortini - Illusion of Time
item.description: yet another dreamy and atmospheric new album. Daniel Avery and Alessandro Cortini (Nine Inch Nails) joined forces and remotely made an album full of distorted drones, warm synth pads, feedback loops and other weird noises.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Pantha Du Prince - Conference of Trees
item.description: already a month ago, the German musician Hendrik Weber aka Pantha Du Prince released the new album Conference of Trees. it has been performed at several theatre gigs last year already. what does it sound like when trees communicate?
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Nine Inch Nails - Ghosts V-VI
item.description: Nine Inch Nails released volumes five and six of their Ghosts series, subtitled Together and Locusts respectively. these two new releases are available for free on their website.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Muzz - Broken Tambourine
item.description: Muzz was formed by Paul Banks (Interpol), Matt Barrick (the Walkmen, Fleet Foxes) and Josh Kaufman (Bonny Light Horseman, Day of the Dead). after dropping their first track Bad Feeling on SoundCloud earlier this month, the band now officially released their first single.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Nils Frahm - Empty
item.description: the eight-track lp was originally written as the soundtrack to a short film he shot with his friend Benoit Toulemonde.
item.dc:creator: grantler records

item.title: Sufjan Stevens and Lowell Brams - Aporia
item.description: Aporia is the new album of Sufjan Stevens and his stepfather Lowell Brams. it contains 21 ambient, instrumental tracks.
item.dc:creator: grantler records
